about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey in the dynamic open world of Bullet Race, where the freedom to drive is yours to embrace, whether you're seeking a leisurely cruise or a path of destruction.

Navigate through a sprawling cityscape that unveils the vital importance of mastering weight and speed, where your driving skills are just as crucial as your marksmanship. Progression isn't just about racing; it's about surviving the chaos that ensues when you're chasing victory from behind, bullets whizzing past you from the front.

Strategize and optimize your vehicle's loadout, where every choice between speed and ammunition becomes a pivotal factor in either escaping imminent danger or forging your own aggressive path. Your success hinges on the smart choices you make as you gear up for the challenges that lie ahead.

In Bullet Race, be prepared to confront a hostile environment where loading your guns becomes a necessity. Not everyone on the road is welcoming, and arming yourself is the key to asserting dominance and ensuring a swift getaway or unleashing unparalleled destruction. Are you ready to take on the Bullet Race challenge and emerge as the ultimate road warrior?

name: Bullet Race

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7000 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into the world of "Bullet Race," a low-poly arcade combat car game where wielding powerful weapons is the difference between shadowy evasion and seizing control. Race, combat, and dominate in this adrenaline-fueled thrill ride!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
